text: Yeah, except I don't remember much. I think the overall theme of the movie was captured whenever youd see him just driving through the night and they'd have those extended camera shots. I can see where the inspiration came from

author: lelouch jipa

text: I bought the channel back from Facebook, 1 day was enough. As for the remix, I mistyped "4 years of hard work", I meant 4 minutes. Anyways, I find this heavy ambient theme to be one of the better ones in the soundtrack, especially since it plays during a quite memorable moment. The hospital beeping sound is very fitting.
author: SupraDarky

text:
I knew the Facebook thing was fake after a millisecond, but that remix thing had me convinced; I never thought you would have done two jokes in a row. 
GG Supra, GG.
author: Jirt

text: On this day two years ago, I decided that I really needed to listen to more video game music.  I then chose to write blogs on video game music about a month later, but this day will always hold a special place in my heart.  Thank you once again Gabe for being my inspiration for writing these blogs and I honestly hope that I can make it a career in the future.  As for this song, I really love how ambient it is.  I remember that moment in the game and it was quite a nice song to hear.  Also, I will continue to listen to video game music for a long time as I love listening to all types of video game music.  If anyone is interested in reading them, please let me know and I will provide the link to you.
author: Eric C.

text: @Eric C. Sure man, send me a link. I'm a video games writer myself, so it would be great to get to know other like-minded writers :)
author: Woodo

text:
So the "four years of hard work" wasn't an intentional April Fool's joke? I was so certain it was.

Hope you didn't lose too much money on the Facebook deal, though.  ;)
author: PsychadelicoDuck

text:
@Woodo Thanks.  I'm glad to see that you're interested.  Here is the link:
http://slamdunkgator91.wordpress.com/.  I do hope you enjoy reading them. :)
author: Eric C.
